query:
SELECT "user".id,
               "user".section,
               "user".class,
               COALESCE("user".name, "user".email) AS "name!: String",
               activity_user.joined_at IS NOT NULL    AS "present!: bool"
        FROM activity_user
                 JOIN "user" ON activity_user.user_id = "user".id
        WHERE activity_user.activity_id = $1
          AND activity_user.round = $2
        ORDER BY name;
